Params[3]: Liv picks up the stack of cards inside the box and notices a note sticking at the back.
Go home and stay with your partner on this rare night of the Double Seventh Festival! Use this present well. That's the most I can do for you!
Liv stops saying it out loud after a few words, and her cheek burns red after reading the note.
C-Commandant... Being a p-partner might be... It's just that I'm hoping to focus on our mission before the fight is over...

Params[2]: (Explain where the mystery box comes from)

Params[3]: Phew... So you didn't know what was inside the box either. "Anything I Want"... I don't think I want anything aside from help on our mission.
Not to mention that I find it... difficult to ask someone to do something I can do just with a card.

Params[2]: Would you say no if someone you care about asks you to do something simple together?
How would you feel about that, then?

Params[3]: If it's someone I care about... I'd feel glad to be needed.
You are not sure what kind of scenario Liv is thinking about, but you see a faint smile on her face as she answers you.

Params[2]: I think the people you care about would love to be needed in the same way.

Params[3]: Her eyes sparkle under the starlight. Determined, she slowly takes out one of the cards and hands it to you.
In that case, can I ask you to walk me back to the Gray Raven lounge, Commandant?
